name: KnappMIL
description:
KnappMIL is an application that can be used to develop your psychomotor skills. Based on years of research, this application groups tests that were developed to improve your ability to respond to complex situations in an agile way.

These tests are used as a form of admission to various air forces, clubs and companies. Training in this application is essential to ensure that you perform well in these tests and that you can follow your dream.

The tests:

  • Shapes: match shapes and colors;
  • Directions: match shapes and directions;
  • Horizon: keep the bars aligned;
  • Tangram: the needle in a haystack;
  • Flight: keep your airplane in the correct flight path; and
  • Boss: bring it on.

Need help with the tests or anything else? You can reach me at email+itchio@jeankn.app.

Attack!
